summary: Add two (so far) versions of Triss Merigold.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZhKmj.png[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/4qZtx.png[/img]

Triss Merigold\'s staff comes into Skyrim, so far for the base release adds only two versions of it, both fire and ice. They are not craftable, you can find them into Skyrim, both of them have their own altars where they can be found, not to hidden yet, you can check the screens for their locations. The plan so far is to add more versions all with different elements and who knows custom enchantments/effects in the future. If you find any bugs or you have any suggestions let me know :) 

[img]http://i.imgur.com/bgYm9.png[/img]

[b][color=\"red\"]Triss Merigold\'s Staff v1[/color][/b]

[color=\"orange\"][b]v1.0[/b][/color] - First public release, this adds two version for Fire and Ice, Both of them can be found in Skyrim, each one having it\'s own altar. Check screens for location.
[color=\"orange\"][b]v1.1[/b][/color] - Custom effects, DMG been re-touched, Diffuse texture upscaled. 

[img]http://i.imgur.com/1ocjD.png[/img] 

1. Download the latest version (Always on Main File @ Downloads) 
2. Unpack the archive and move all files into \\Data\\ 
3. Make sure TrissStaff.esp is checked (Should be on by default)
4. Check the screens for staffs location. 
5. Enjoy :)

[img]http://i.imgur.com/kifaD.png[/img]

Soon.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/zwMzN.png[/img]

Soon.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/lrq9j.png[/img]

N/A

The mesh is property of CDProjekt (All stuffs have been added in Skyrim with their approval) so alot of lvoe for them <3 

[/center]
author: sn00p
